pages.text: A simple train car that carries a Mana Pool, similar to mana pool minecart.

It works like a mana pool minecart, Mana Pumps will I/O independently of the docker mode if the car is on top of a $(l:docking_rails)$(item)Docker rail$(0)$(/l). Trains $(l:spring)$(item)linked$(0)$(/l) to the car will auto dock if the conditions apply.
